basics.name: Sreejith Sasidharan
basics.label: Robotics Engineer & Autonomous Systems Specialist
basics.summary: Robotics engineer with proven cross-disciplinary expertise in autonomous systems and product design. Currently developing Level 4 (L4) autonomous driving solutions for freight carriers. Additionally, I have professional and academic experience with deep learning algorithms and workflows in the computer vision domain. I have also done full-stack development of an award-winning social robot named Haksh-E from scratch. My passion for developing technologies with tangible real-world impact drives my interests. I am a lifelong learner who hopes to gain deeper insights that will enable me to make meaningful contributions toward this goal.
